snippet: Israel's defense minister said Monday the U.S. has notified Israel that imposing Israeli sovereignty over the West Bank would lead to an "immediate crisis" with the Trump administration....

headline.main: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports
headline.print_headline: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports

lead_paragraph: Israel's defense minister said Monday the U.S. has notified Israel that imposing Israeli sovereignty over the West Bank would lead to an "immediate crisis" with the Trump administration.
